issue.title: [CF 1543] bug report about " target; focus "
issue.body:
bug report:

can't detect  target; focus  's casting with same icon

if i set target; focus as detected units, then the icon only works for target 

if i set focus; target as detected units, then the icon only works for focus

 

PS: spell setting as empty 

even the language is different..but the imgs enough to show u how i set...

 

it's not about something should hidden or not..because first unit works well. the second unit not working...


> Posted by CurseForge user longgegame | Imported from CurseForge issue #1543 | Raw

comments.body:
I already told you exactly why your configuration is wrong and exactly how to fix in a reply to your comment on the main Curse site.

Edited Aug 6, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
